name: Space adventure (itch) (petifox)
description:
You have crash-landed on an alien planet. You need to defend your spaceship from the attacking aliens as long as possible. To do this, you can move with WASD, and you can chop the aliens when your sword touches them. You also have a secret power. You can activate it with a left click on your mouse. By doing this, you create a clone of yourself, but be careful because your sword can destroy them. Clones can also destroy each other the same way you do.

credits
